entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as sitting on the other side of Harry. The text does not provide any additional information about Snape.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall's empty seat is next to Snape's seat, indicating that she is likely absent from the scene.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as sitting in the center of the table, wearing magnificent deep green robes and shining silver hair. He is lost in thought, staring at the ceiling through his half-moon spectacles.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as sitting next to Harry, moaning that he could eat a hippogriff.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the scene, and is described as glancing up at the ceiling after seeing Dumbledore's reaction.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is staring up at the ceiling through his half-moon spectacles, lost in thought.
Harry glances up at the ceiling after seeing Dumbledore's reaction.
